sentences.sContent: He is equivocating a lot about what is going to happen if and when there are elections.
sentences.sCn: 他含含糊糊地说着很多如果进行选举会发生的状况。

remMethod.val: equivoc (看作equivocal， 模棱两可的) + ate (做…) → 说模棱两可的话

words.tran: 说模棱话的人；说话支吾者

trans.tranCn: 说模棱两可的话； 支吾
trans.tranOther: to avoid giving a clear or direct answer to a question
